live_updates: Issues in the area have been resolved.   Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
49161.summary: Some customers in the Whyte Ridge area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
49161.title: May 4 - Winnipeg (Whyte Ridge) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
